author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a shocking incident, a gang of five took a 32-year-old woman to an isolated place at Keeraithurai here at knifepoint and sexually assaulted her on Wednesday night. Police said that the victim reported the crime to the police only on Thursday afternoon and three persons had been arrested.

According to the complainant, she was talking to a friend near the Corporation cremation yard at Moolakkarai when the gang approached them.

After detaining the youth, the gang brandished a knife and dragged her into a bush and sexually assaulted her. The woman underwent a medical test, the police said. Based on the complaint, Keeraithurai police arrested G. Karthikeyan (24), R. Manikandan (23) and S. Muniyasamy (23), all said to be casual workers from Villapuram. The police are on the lookout for two others. The accused have been booked for illegal confinement, sexual assault by gang and criminal intimidation.
title: Woman sexually assaulted at knifepoint
